languages.text: "Сохранил бы и больше, если бы не преподобный Иеронимус. На его речи многие клюнули, принялись каяться да исповедаться. Стольких людей к вере лицом обратил, что теперь его уже и тронуть боятся. В силу вошел старик".

traits.locale_text: "Сохранил бы и больше, если бы не преподобный Иеронимус. На его речи многие клюнули, принялись каяться да исповедаться. Стольких людей к вере лицом обратил, что теперь его уже и тронуть боятся. В силу вошел старик".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."
languages.original_text: "Сохранил бы и больше, если бы не преподобный Иеронимус. На его речи многие клюнули, принялись каяться да исповедаться. Стольких людей к вере лицом обратил, что теперь его уже и тронуть боятся. В силу вошел старик".

traits.locale_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many fell for his sermons and took to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “要不是因为希罗尼穆斯牧师，忠于他的人本来应该更多。很多人开始听信他的布道，开始进行忏悔。他让很多人加入了他的教派，弗拉迪姆的人再也不敢去打他的主意了。这个老头儿现在是一股不可忽视的力量。”
languages.original_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."

traits.locale_text: “要不是因为希罗尼穆斯牧师，忠于他的人本来应该更多。很多人开始听信他的布道，开始进行忏悔。他让很多人信了他的教派，弗拉迪姆的人再也不敢去碰这个人了。这个老头儿现在是一股不可忽视的力量。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭さえいなければ、彼の周りにはもっと人がいた事でしょう。ヒエロニムスの説教を聞いて、多くの人が悔い改め、罪を告白するようになりました。多くの者を信者にさせたこともあり、誰もが彼を恐れている。あのジジイの力は、今や無視できないものになりました」
languages.original_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭さえいなければ、彼の周りにはもっと人がいた事でしょう。ヒエロニムスの説教を聞いて、多くの人が悔い改め、罪を告白するようになりました。多くの者を信者にさせたこともあり、誰もが彼を恐れている。あのジジイの力は、今や無視できないものになりました」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Habría tenido más de no ser por el reverendo Hieronymus. Muchos han caído en sus sermones para luego arrepentirse y confesar. Ha convertido a tantos que ya no se atreven a tocarlo. El viejo tiene mucho peso».
languages.original_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."

traits.locale_text: «Habría tenido más de no ser por el reverendo Hieronymus. Muchos cayeron en sus sermones, se arrepintieron y confesaron. Ha convertido a tantos que ya no se atreven a tocarlo. El viejo tiene mucho peso».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Ohne Reverend Hieronymus hätte er noch mehr. Viele sind auf seine Predigten hereingefallen und haben angefangen, zu bereuen und zu beichten. Er hat so viele zum Glauben bekehrt, dass sie es nicht mehr wagen, ihn anzurühren. Der alte Mann ist inzwischen eine echte Macht auf der Station."
languages.original_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."

traits.locale_text: "Ohne Reverend Hieronymus hätte er noch mehr. Viele sind auf seine Predigten hereingefallen und haben angefangen, zu bereuen und zu beichten. Er hat so viele zum Glauben bekehrt, dass sie es nicht mehr wagen, ihn anzurühren. Der alte Mann ist inzwischen eine echte Macht auf der Station."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Malheureusement, il n'en reste pas tant que ça à cause du révérend Hiéronymus. Nombreux sont ceux qui se sont laissés abuser par ses sermons et ont décidé de se repentir. Il a converti tellement de monde à sa foi qu'il est devenu quasiment intouchable et aujourd'hui, ce vieillard est devenu une menace extrêmement sérieuse. »
languages.original_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, il n'en reste pas tant que ça à cause du révérend Hiéronymus. Beaucoup se sont laissés abuser par ses sermons et ont décidé de se repentir. Il a converti tellement de monde à sa foi qu'il est devenu quasiment intouchable et aujourd'hui, ce vieillard est devenu une menace extrêmement sérieuse. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Muhterem Hieronymus sayesinde sayıları azaldı. Birçoğu söylevlerine kanıp tövbe etmeye ve günah çıkarmaya başladı. Saflarına onca kişiyi kattı, âdeta dokunulmaz oldu. İhtiyarın eli sağlam artık."
languages.original_text: "He'd have had more if it weren't for Reverend Hieronymus. Many have fallen for his sermons and taken to repenting and confessing. He's turned so many to the faith, that they don't dare touch him anymore. The old man's a force to be reckoned with now."

traits.locale_text: "Muhterem Hieronymus sağ olsun, sayıları azaldı. Birçoğu söylevlerine kanıp tövbe etmeye ve günah çıkartmaya başladı. Saflarına onca kişiyi kattı ki âdeta dokunulmaz oldu. İhtiyarın eli sağlam artık."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
